Question
========
Open the SPSS file.

What is the Z-score of the student with student number (st) 344000 for course 1.3 (course 1_3)? Round your answer to 5 decimal places.

**Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-131-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-131-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The Z-score of the student with student number 344000 for course 1.3 is 1.99334.
